thread.title: ECHS Recruitment 2017 – Medical Officer, Specialist & Dental Officer Posts
thread.title_full: ECHS Recruitment 2017 – Medical Officer, Specialist & Dental Officer Posts

author: freejobalert.com
title: ECHS Recruitment 2017 – Medical Officer, Specialist & Dental Officer Posts
text: Click here for Application Form & Qualification details - ECHS Recruitment 2017 – Dental Officer Posts: Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) Polyclinic Port Blair has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Dental Officer vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 23-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… ECHS Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Dental Officer Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess BDS with min 3 years of work experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format along with relevant documents to concerned address as given in the notification on or before 23-02-2017 & attend the interview along with originals, photocopies of certificates, testimonials, two passport size photographs on 27-02-2017at 10.00 hrs. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Last Date for receipt of Application: 23-02-2017. Date & Time of Interview: 27-02-2017at 10.00 hrs. Venue: INS Jarawa Conference Hall, Haddo, Portblair. For more details like remuneration, terms and conditions & other information click on the link given below….
